title: Fendi, Ferragamo, and Fangs
description: Meet the vamps of the Vamps, Inc. modeling Olivia, straight-A nerd turned overnight star model--unfortunately, her boyfriend doesn't know exactly how much she's changed...Big and beautiful Veronika, the new plus-size model for Vamps, Inc. on an all-blood diet...and Sydney, misunderstood bad girl and whispered-about tabloid sensation.It's about time that the undead live it up...
author: Julie Kenner
